name: img.js
description: A JavaScript library for bitmap graphics.

scripts.browserify: npm run ensure-build-dir && browserify src/img.js --standalone img > dist/img.js
scripts.watchify: npm run ensure-build-dir && watchify src/img.js --standalone img --debug -o build/img.js -v
scripts.dist: npm run test && npm run browserify && npm run uglify
